name: Eddie Marlow
personality: Nervous, fidgety, obsessed with old-world machinery.
description: Eddie keeps the rollercoaster from collapsing entirely. He swears the machinery has been acting strange lately.
questHooks: Claims the rollercoaster motors 'hum' even when unpowered.
Found a metal shard wedged in the tracks that vibrates faintly.
Wants someone to check the maintenance tunnels for intruders.
